    • Field Detail

      • cells

        public Cell[] cells

    • Constructor Detail

      • CTMLink

        public CTMLink(int id,
               Node source,
               Node dest,
               double capacity,
               double ffspd,
               double wavespd,
               double jamd,
               double length,
               int numLanes)
        Constructs the link with the given parameters
        Parameters:
        id - the link id
        source - the source node
        dest - the destination node
        capacity - the capacity per lane (veh/hr)
        ffspd - the free flow speed (mi/hr)
        wavespd - the congested wave speed (mi/hr)
        jamd - the jam density (veh/mi)
        length - the length (mi)
        numLanes - the number of lanes

    • Method Detail

      • setMesoDelta

        public void setMesoDelta(double delta)
        Sets the congested wave speed as delta * Link.getFFSpeed()
        Parameters:
        delta - the ratio of congested wave speed to free flow speed

      • getCells

        public Cell[] getCells()
        Returns the array of Cells
        Returns:
        the array of Cells

      • initialize

        public void initialize()
        Called after all data is read. This method constructs the list of cells. Subclasses should override createStartCell(), createCell(avdta.network.link.cell.Cell), and createEndCell(avdta.network.link.cell.Cell) to change the cells created.
        Overrides:
        initialize in class Link

      • createEndCell

        public Cell createEndCell(Cell prev)
        Creates the last cell on this link. This is used in initialize().
        Parameters:
        prev - the next to last cell on the link
        Returns:
        the end cell

      • getFirstCellSpeed

        Returns:
        the speed of the first cell

      • getQueueLength

        public int getQueueLength()
        Returns the length of the queue, which is based on whether cells are congested or not. The method starts from the last cell on the link, and continues until it reaches an uncongested cell. The output is the sum of cell occupancies within the congested region.
        Overrides:
        getQueueLength in class Link
        Returns:
        the number of vehicles in the queue
        See Also:
        Cell.isCongested()

      • getEffQueueLength

        public int getEffQueueLength()
        Returns the efficiency queue length in the congested region.
        Overrides:
        getEffQueueLength in class Link
        Returns:
        the efficiency queue length
        See Also:
        getQueueLength()

      • getMesoDelta

        public double getMesoDelta()
        Returns the ratio of free flow speed to congested wave speed
        Returns:
        the ratio of free flow speed to congested wave speed

      • reset

        public void reset()
        Resets this link to restart the simulation. This rests the number of lanes in each cell.
        Overrides:

      • getSendingFlow

        public java.util.List<Vehicle> getSendingFlow()
        Returns the sending flow from the last cell on this link. All vehicles in the sending flow have their arrival time at the end of the link updated to be the current simulation time.
        Specified by:
        getSendingFlow in class Link
        Returns:
        the sending flow

      • getVehiclesCanMove

        Specified by:
        getVehiclesCanMove in class Link
        Returns:
        the sending flow
